website_summaries.verdict: With plenty of features to keep children safe and secure, it's still compact enough to fit three in a larger backseat for growing families.
pros: Designed for children from 5 to 80 pounds with an adjustable headrest for growing toddlers
Entire unit is easy to clean
Users love how well-padded it is for their kids
cons: Some feel the buckle release isn't as responsive as it could be
Can be tricky to install, so read the enclosed manual

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure it's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: HARD to install. Even when you install It correctly, it still isn't installed right. You need to have super strength and literally sit IN the carseat when you install this thing. I don't like how there's no adjustable base wedge like my safety first carseat (amazing btw) it just kinda floats where you install it with a big gap under it. Yes I read the instructions. Yes I even watched videos on how to. And I even asked my stepdad who's a fireman to help me install it. He said he's never installed a carseat quite as difficult as this one. I'm not quite sure the cheap price is worth the risk of safety. WONDERING if it's installed tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: izziexo

customer_reviews.title: Will not properly lay flat in a 2017 Dodge Caravan SXT.
customer_reviews.text: I drive a 2017 Dodge Caravan, and the car seat is awkward when installed rear-facing in the second row of seating. It seems as though the seats are too inclined to properly allow the car seat to lay flat, so i have to prop up the empty crevices with blankets. 😕 I will keep this car seat because it was a gift and will fit as a front-facing seat, but I’m yhe meantime (almost a full year), I will have to continue to prop it up. 😔
customer_reviews.author: jen mak hart

customer_reviews.title: Rear facing Is Horrible with this carseat!
customer_reviews.text: If you are reading this I am going to assume you are trying to figure out if this is a good car seat for the money. It is not! Do not buy this car seat for a rear facing child! It is horribly designed! It's almost impossible to install and in order to keep it up at the proper level you have to put rolled up towels underneath the car seat if you don't it will slip! You are probably going to have to buy a new carseat when you realize this so save a few dollars and just get a better one!
customer_reviews.author: cashly08

customer_reviews.title: Great seat for the value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 10 month old (she’s in the 25 percentile for height and weight) and she fits perfectly so I personally wouldn’t use for smaller babies. Other people have said the latch system is a challenge but I never use them anyway as they are all a hassle no matter the seat. The adjusting is very easy and would recommend for anyone looking to upgrade after an infant seat!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Wells

customer_reviews.title: So chic and cute and comfortable...and way easier on the money. I give it an  A.
customer_reviews.text: I love it...it will save so much money and Its so cute and comfortable. Covers all the stages past infant. Very comfortable. Make sure you get your kids angle right every time you put it in somewhere else. If in reverse mode...you got to use the seat belt. Wish it had hooks for reverse mode. I have seen lesser quality ones go for almost 300. I love love love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as one twice the cost but itll work for short rides and such.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney R

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cheap. Absolutely recommend this seat
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing carseat the only down side is the cup holder is flimsy and not attached permanently to the seat so that is a bad design other than that my daughter loves her seat
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Turner

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!! Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy absolutely horrible! Very hard to install correctly, and when you do they tip over no matter how tight.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Kochuk-Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Need to make seat belt hole bigger for men's hands
customer_reviews.text: The product is good my grandaughter loves to sit in it. The only thing is thay need to make seat belt hole bigger. My husband has a real hard time getting his hand through.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Ok but not for small kids it is more like a glorified booster seat. The seat hooks are not ideal either. It is a nice print and the cover is a nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight AND Safe!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight with superior protection and support. Bought a second one for another kid!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: The good quality of this product.
customer_reviews.text: This seat was just what we grandparents needed for a visit with our three year old grandchild! It was easy to install and comfortable for this age. The fabric was easy to clean. The price was perfect. The parents were thrilled to not have to lug a seat along with their luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Marysue Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for a good price. Nice colors as well. The buckling mechanism is a little bit on the cheap side, but overall well made.
customer_reviews.author: Yggdrasiler

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat for my babysitters car because it was affordable and I was sick of getting my car seat in and out. I was surprised at the quality of this when it came in! It’s cute and it looks and feels very comfy. To be honest I wasn’t expecting much for the price. I wish I’d have gotten this for my car instead of paying $300 for a “name brand.”
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think!buy it
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect easy to use flexible enough I liked the color and style
customer_reviews.author: Mahsa

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this car seat. My daughter is one, a big one! And she fits great with lots of room. It reclines back not as mush as I would like but it doesn’t seem to bother her so good purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy set installation, well priced
customer_reviews.text: Paid $75, easy to install, safe, comfortable for long road trips. Easy to pick up and set up! Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Car seat is great!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with quality and cushioning. I did have a little bit of difficulty installing due to having a small car.
customer_reviews.author: P Knight

customer_reviews.title: Big kids size for growing babies
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat, it's the perfect size for my one year old granddaughter because she is not a big baby but she's long. I love it for her growing size
customer_reviews.author: karen mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Carseat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandchildren. Well worth the price, quality. Isn’t big & bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great seat and great value
customer_reviews.text: Great seat!! Super easy to install if you know what you are doing! Comfort is good very comparably to my daughters grace contender
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Front face use only
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great car seat for farward facing ONLY rear face is hell an will not lean correctly
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesnt seem uncomfortable at all, actually falls asleep in this carseat almost everytime! Easy to get in and out of the car and adjust straps when child grows. It can also be used for years! I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anya Reed

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter who is a little over a year old loves her new carseat! And it grows with her so well worth the money! Love love love it will buy another when my other granddaughter gets big enough
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Cery good seat. Priced great. Wide range of weight capacities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Not very easy to install in our truck or Ford Edge. Doesn’t sit properly( to where it doesn’t move all over) in any vehicle I’ve had it in. Straps fit weird on my daughters shoulders
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Safety comes first / Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Seat is perfect for growing infants however to use as a rear facing seat is VERY DIFFICULT especially in a compact car like mine is overall it’s a great value for item
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Arredondo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat to use as a spare for my mom’s car, and it is absolutely the best value you could possibly get for your money. Such a great car seat.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat! Glad i made the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Doing the belt for reverse facing is a lol pain in the behind but Deffinetly worth it! So glad i got it!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for years!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We love it! Baby is comfortable, easy to install! I love that we can use this for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat
customer_reviews.text: Is very comfy i am going to buy another one for my other baby I really like this carseat. My baby likes it too
customer_reviews.author: Annie rote

customer_reviews.title: Nice and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have purch ased th ee sets of these and have had no issues with them!! Good Product.Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: tomerasd

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter both have one now and she screamed in excitement when she saw it. It fits perfectly in my Durango
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Very safe
customer_reviews.text: My great niece fits nice and she loves how she can sit up high and look out the windows now.
customer_reviews.author: andrea martinez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my granddaughters better than I thought they would be very eazy to install
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Safe
customer_reviews.text: I love how comfortable this car seat feels & I love how the cup holder is detachable.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Campos

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and safe!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this car seat. It's cute, affordable and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Great seat.
customer_reviews.text: Best car seat I've ever purchased. My daughter loves it. Super safe too.
customer_reviews.author: Clover Bennett

customer_reviews.title: wrong order
customer_reviews.text: I made this order and everything came good however the color we ordered was incorrect.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful in person. I'll hopefully come back to review when in use.
